reviews.text:
Absolutely wonderful spot! I'm a student at OSU and I am so glad I found this place. 

Best seasoned chicken ever! It's deliciously crunchy on the outside,...

The best chicken nuggets with a perfect crispy herby seasoning. The chicken is so juicy and flavorful! 

We usually get the mixed veggies which are great....
This place was absolutely worth the walk and wait! The service is efficient and the aroma as he cooks was heavenly. The food itself was incredible! The...
